name: nuovix-extension
description: Premium security-first knowledge management Chrome extension

scripts.test: npm run build && npx playwright test
scripts.test:headed: npm run build && npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:debug: npm run build && npx playwright test --debug
scripts.test:core: npm run build && npx playwright test extension-core.spec.js
scripts.test:flows: npm run build && npx playwright test user-flows.spec.js
scripts.debug: npm run build && node -e "console.log('Extension built. Load ./dist in Chrome and access debug dashboard via extension options.')"
scripts.analyze: npm run build && npx playwright test --reporter=html

author: Nuovix Team
